title: Gorgeous and Spacious 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Apartment
description: This is an open concept loft that plays as a two bedroom or one bedroom plus den. The first thing you notice as you step into this center city loft is the dramatic height of the two stories high ceiling. The second thing might be the expansive wall of windows spanning the entire south exposure of the living spaces. The third could be the beautiful, original form from the days this building was a factory, freshly re-varnished maple hardwood floors. A few steps further into the center of the unit and it is the slate tiled fireplace with oversized stone hearth that catches your eye. Imagine yourself sitting there cozying up next to a warm wood burning fire this winter. Turn yourself around and look to the other end of the condo and you’ll see the dining area with a gorgeous modern chandelier and rustic dining table capable of seating for ten people. A reclaimed wall hutch adds the charm of the dining nook. The kitchen is equipped with a soapstone countertop and a river rock backsplash. There are maple wood cabinets to compliment the floors and stainless steel appliances, including an under counter wine refrigerator. Turning around again and looking behind the fireplace are two large rooms, one stacked on top of the other and both with built-in bookshelves and impressively large walk-in closets. Use one as a bedroom and the other a den, or both bedrooms. The bathroom has been customized with an extra deep soaking tub, dual flushing toilet, vanity cabinet and warming towel rack. Being on the top floor of the building there is easy access to the brand new community rooftop deck. This space expands your enjoyment and entertaining space to the outdoors where you can enjoy panoramic views of Philadelphia’s skyline.

Welcome to Lofts 640 in the heart of Philadelphia, PA! As you enter 640 North Broad, you'll step away from the busy street and into an urban space that artfully blends the old with the new. Our community is vibrant and welcoming, with state-of-the-art amenities designed to nurture both body and spirit. You'll love relaxing in our glass-domed pool house, where the warm salt water pool and Jacuzzi spa offer the perfect respite from the stresses of daily life. Our lobby is a work of art, featuring geometric ceiling lights that illuminate the mocha-colored floors. With stunning white and stainless steel accents, the lobby is the perfect introduction to the energy and excitement of Loft 640. Located just six blocks from City Hall on Broad Street, our community is centrally located to shops, restaurants, hospitals, and the thriving community of Fairmount. Reading Terminal Market and the Pennsylvania Convention Center are just minutes away. Living at Loft 640 is the perfect combination of the commuter convenience of center city living and the spaciousness of true loft living. Welcome home!

title: Affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square!
description:
Location Location Location! Available 08/1/2023. 20th & Walnut - only a 2 min walk to Rittenhouse Square, bars, restaurants, shops, historic places & more! This building is perfectly situated close to all the best spots in Philly, major universities, highways & whatever you can imagine. 2010 Walnut St was built in 1860 and was originally owned by the Wilkinson Sword Blade family. title: Enjoy the convenience of luxury of Center City living!
description:
Enjoy the convenience of luxury of Center City living in this 1-Bedroom 1-Bathroom on the 18th floor of The Ellington! This spacious home offers wonderful light and city views from the oversized windows, an abundance of storage throughout the home, and an in-unit washer and dryer. You enter the home through a foyer with a hanging closet that leads you to the generous living/dining room. The kitchen is outfitted with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and an abundance of cabinet and counter space. The large bedroom offers a deep double closet and even more incredible city views. The bathroom is off the bedroom and offers a linen closet, tile floors, and a combination shower/tub. 1-year lease is required. Tenant is responsible for electricity and internet/cable TV. Tenant can have cats. Fees include a $300 move-in fee and $200 lease fee to the Ellington. The Ellington is a high-rise on the 1500 block of Chestnut St. The building offers a 24-hour door person and fitness center. All homes are wired for either Comcast or Verizon FiOS High-Speed Internet and Cable. Residents can have up to 2 pets that are under 40 lbs. Located in the heart of Center City, you’re close to everything you need: fabulous dining options such as Butcher & Singer, Marathon Grill, The Oyster House, Harp & Crown, Guiseppe's and Sons, and Elixr Coffee Roasters, only one block away from the incredible shopping Walnut St has to offer. Getting around the city couldn’t be easier as you are steps from a plethora of bus lines, the Broad Street Line subway, and Suburban Station. title: You’ll never want to leave your neighborhood!
description:
This unit features an extra room which can be used as an office or an additional bedroom Welcome to your new home, 735 Spruce Street, located in the heart of Philadelphia’s charming and historic Washington Square West neighborhood. This apartment features tall ceilings, a spacious floor plan, plenty of storage space, and oversized windows. Washington Square houses a large collection of historic 18th and 19th-century residential architecture that offers you a glimpse into Philadelphia’s past. A charming district filled with cobblestone streets and brick structures, you will never tire of the wide array of dining, shopping, sightseeing, and museums. Local attractions include Washington Square Park (5-min walk) and Penn’s Landing (along the waterfront), while historic attractions include the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall. Whole Foods Market, ACME, and one of the most well-known restaurants in Philadelphia, Zahav, are all within walking distance of the Properties. With so many local amenities you’ll never want to leave your neighborhood! 735 Spruce is also immediately catty-corner to Pennsylvania Hospital, offering nurses, residents, doctors, and employees of the nearby institution immediate access to housing.

title: Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: This well maintained 3BD/1.5BTH House for rent
description: Nestled in a child friendly, quiet cul-de-sac is this well maintained 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath end unit townhome with a large fenced in yard, deck and 2 car private parking in the desirable Wynmere Hunt neighborhood of Horsham. The lower level has a large living room with a large box window extending into a formal dining room facing the side yard. The eat-in kitchen opens up to the rear yard with the large deck perfect for entertainment. Kitchen includes stainless steel dish drying rack, stainless steel cabinet racks, stainless steel microwave and natural gas range, dishwasher, and refrigerator. The utility room with laundry and a small pantry/storage area, and a powder room completes the first floor. Upper level boasts of three bedrooms, and a full bathroom. The master bedroom has a walk-in closet, a vanity/dressing area with private entrance to the bathroom. Closets include custom made closet-made organizers. A large custom made detached shed, an attached shed, and a full attic offers plenty of in-home storage opportunities. Located in the award-winning Hatboro Horsham School District (Simmons Elementary School), the home has easy access to major highways (309, 152, 611, and Turnpike) and shopping malls. It sits with-in a block of the famous Horsham Power Line trail with walking access to the Horsham Public Library and park system. Plenty of additional off street car parking is available. title: Renovated 2BR Family Home
description: Totally renovated and ready for you to move right in! This cozy ranch home is in a quiet neighborhood with tree lined streets and plenty of sidewalks. As you enter the home you are greeted by a large, open, and bright living room which adjoins the kitchen. The kitchen is the perfect size to fit a small table, has new stainless-steel appliances, and plenty of cabinet and counter space. Moving through the kitchen next up is the spacious family room addition with a bow window overlooking the backyard. The laundry room, with brand new washer and dryer and another refrigerator, is located off the family room and has an exit to the rear yard. Completing the home are the two brand new bathrooms, two bedrooms with ceiling fans a home office and hardwood floors throughout. There is also a full unfinished basement for all your storage needs and a shed in the backyard perfect for storing bikes and gardening tools. Great location, close to shopping, schools, farmers market, YMCA, Valley Forge Park and King of Prussia Mall.
